abstract: Strong performances in the bank’s asset management, credit card groups and treasury services groups helped offset troubles in the investment banking unit.
snippet: Strong performances in the bank’s asset management, credit card groups and treasury services groups helped offset troubles in the investment banking unit.
lead_paragraph: JPMorgan Chase trudged through the third quarter to post a 2.3 percent increase in earnings yesterday, even though its investment banking unit was ravaged by this summer’s credit problems.

headline.main: JPMorgan Chase Posts a Profit, but Takes $2 Billion Write-Down
